title: Greg Miller Reacts to The Snyder Cut Release - Kinda Funny Screencast (Ep. 72)
description:
If you visit http://expressvpn.com/morning, you can get
an extra 3 months of ExpressVPN for free!

Get 20% off and free shipping with the code MORNING at http://manscaped.com

Greg joins to the show to talk through the real-world consiquences of Warner Bros. finally releasing the Snyder cut of Justice League. 

Time Stamps - 
00:01:00 - Housekeeping
Go to KindaFunny.com/Store and check out our new stuff like the PS I Love you Sweater & the Super Porty shirt:: - What We’ve Been Watching
- News -
00:06:00 - The Synder Cut
00:24:50 - Deathstroke Original Post Credit Scene
00:27:45 - Legally Blonde 3
00:41:05 - What have you been watching!
00:58:10 - Next week's Bronze: What are your thoughts on Justice league news

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
